name: Suffocation, Instant
source: Dark Markets - A Guide to Katapesh pg. 57
text: This spell functions like slay living, and kills by immediate suffocation. Creatures that do not need to breathe are immune to this spell. The target is considered to have taken a dose of pesh for the purpose of addiction and withdrawal effects.
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则部分生效; 见文本
text_zh: 此法术之运作与杀生术(slay living)相似，并且立即死于窒息。不用呼吸的生物免疫此法术。受到影响的目标，在决定成瘾以及戒瘾效果时，会被认为吸食了一剂仙人掌粹。
